  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    choco.IExtensionnable, choco.IPretty, choco.kernel.solver.constraints.SConstraint<choco.kernel.solver.variables.integer.IntDomainVar>, choco.kernel.solver.propagation.listener.IntPropagator, Cloneable, EventListener

    public class DisjointEntropy
extends choco.kernel.solver.constraints.integer.AbstractLargeIntSConstraint
    Enforces two sets of variables values to be disjoint created sofdem - 08/09/11
    Author:
    Sophie Demassey

      • setRequired

        public void setRequired(int val,
               int group,
               int other)
                 throws choco.kernel.solver.ContradictionException
        update the internal data and filter when a variable is newly instantiated 1) fail if a variable in the other group is already instantiated to this value 2) remove the value of the domains of all the variables of the other group
        Parameters:
        val - the new assigned value
        group - the group of the new instantiated variable
        other - the other group (other = 1-group)
        Throws:
        choco.kernel.solver.ContradictionException - when some variables in both groups are instantiated to the same value
